## Hi there

I'm Julia; I also go by Julie. 

I'm a marine ecologist and founded Openscapes to champion kinder, better science in less time. My main focus is how open source, data science, and environmental research can empower us to uncover climate solutions faster by working together as inclusive teams and communities.
